interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Multi-Purpose Electric Massage Gel & Oil Warmer, Wax Melter, Includes Aluminum Warming Pot (16.9 fl oz), Knob Dial To Adjust Temperature (95F to 257F), With LCD Screen
Review Date: 2022/02/22
Store: EROTICGEL
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 7.72 x 7.6 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '754590183604'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c9f78d09ec648d2bdc92f5ad9698e698]] The look of this is very modern and I like that you can see an actual degree not just high, medium, low. The soft wax pots from my old warmer have a lot of space on the sides even with the removable insert, but it still heats and melted them nicely.  My problem comes with the shape of the warmer.  I scrape the side of the stick that I'm not using on the edge of the pot to conserve my wax and the round shape makes it tip if I do this too hard.  It only comes with the warmer and the removable pot.  To not come with any more than that i feel like $50 is kind of steep.  (At the time of writing this $39.99 which is more reasonable.  The bottom glows red or green letting you know if your wax is up to temp. Its nice and looks nice, but not great for my usage.
Review Title: Looks great but not practical for me
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
35pcs Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit ADIMANIS Eyebrow Powder One Step Brow Stamp and Shaping Kit Eyebrow Stencils Eyebrows Shape Reusable Eyebrow Brush, Hairline Powder Contouring Stick (Light Brown)
ADIMANIS
{'Brand': 'ADIMANIS', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.13 x 1.65 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '761325190127'}
All the stencils and the purple t shape stencils are not long enough for my brows but otherwise work as described. The powder does not. Can't get enough powder on the presser to do any good. Doesn't show up well and not enough powder to really transfer or even do 1 brow without repressing the powder multiple times. I use the stencils with another kit. The powder and powder applicator are a joke
Powder didn't work at all
Multi-Purpose Electric Massage Gel & Oil Warmer, Wax Melter, Includes Aluminum Warming Pot (16.9 fl oz), Knob Dial To Adjust Temperature (95F to 257F), With LCD Screen
EROTICGEL

[[VIDEOID:c9f78d09ec648d2bdc92f5ad9698e698]] The look of this is very modern and I like that you can see an actual degree not just high, medium, low. The soft wax pots from my old warmer have a lot of space on the sides even with the removable insert, but it still heats and melted them nicely.  My problem comes with the shape of the warmer.  I scrape the side of the stick that I'm not using on the edge of the pot to conserve my wax and the round shape makes it tip if I do this too hard.  It only comes with the warmer and the removable pot.  To not come with any more than that i feel like $50 is kind of steep.  (At the time of writing this $39.99 which is more reasonable.  The bottom glows red or green letting you know if your wax is up to temp. Its nice and looks nice, but not great for my usage.
Looks great but not practical for me
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty Focus**: The user is actively engaged in eyebrow grooming products, such as stencils and powders, while also exploring tools like wax melters for personal care.
- **Performance Expectations**: They have high expectations regarding product efficacy and express dissatisfaction when products fail to meet advertised claims, as reflected in their critical reviews.
- **Product Usability**: The user values ease of use and effectiveness, seeking products that provide clear, satisfactory results without excessive reapplication or intricacies, indicating a desire for practical solutions.
- **Quality Concerns**: They prioritize consistent performance and value, expressing concerns over pricing and functionality, especially when products do not adequately meet their needs.
- **Review Behavior**: The user tends to leave detailed feedback that mainly highlights product shortcomings, emphasizing their critical approach to evaluating beauty tools and accessories.
- **Material Preferences**: With a mention of reusable features, they lean towards sustainable, eco-friendly options, valuing both functionality and environmental impact in their purchases.
- **Design and Practicality**: They appreciate modern aesthetics in products but also emphasize practicality and user-friendliness, indicating a balance between style and functionality is crucial.

Overall, the user demonstrates a discerning approach to beauty products, seeking both reliable tools for eyebrow shaping and effective warmers for other beauty tasks, while remaining open to complementary products that enhance their experiences.
